meanings.definition: A person who studies or practices cryptology.
meanings.sent1: Cryptologists enjoy solving puzzles and cracking secret codes.
meanings.sent2: The cryptologists worked together to decode the mysterious message.
meanings.sent3: The cryptologists had a friendly competition to see who could solve the code first.
meanings.sent4: In the world of espionage, cryptologists are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The cryptologists' dedication to unraveling mysteries is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who specialize in creating and deciphering codes and ciphers.
meanings.sent1: The cryptologists' team successfully cracked the enemy's communication system.
meanings.sent2: During wartime, cryptologists play a crucial role in securing sensitive information.
meanings.sent3: The cryptologists' annual conference is always full of intriguing discussions.
meanings.sent4: To the outside world, cryptologists' work may seem like magic.
meanings.sent5: The cryptologists' expertise in code-breaking is unmatched.
